fields.name: Beginner
fields.description: You have minimal or textbook knowledge and need close supervision or guidance

fields.name: Advanced beginner
fields.description: You have basic knowledge of key aspects and can do straightforward tasks using your own judgement

fields.name: Competent
fields.description: You have good working and background knowledge and can achieve most tasks using your own judgement

fields.name: Proficient
fields.description: You have deep understanding and take full responsibility for your own work. You can deal with complex situations and make informed decisions

fields.name: Expert
fields.description: You have authoritative knowledge and achieve excellence with ease, going beyond existing standards and seeing the bigger picture
